hadiths.text: Shuraib b. Hani reported:I asked 'A'isha about wiping over the shoes. She said: You better go to 'Ali, for he knows more about this than I. I, therefore, came to 'Ali and he narrated from the Apostle (ﷺ) like this

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّوْقِيتِ فِي الْمَسْحِ عَلَى الْخُفَّيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: Time-limit for wiping over the khuff
